resp = client.search(
    index="my_locations",
    query={
        "bool": {
            "must": {
                "match_all": {}
            },
            "filter": {
                "geo_bounding_box": {
                    "pin.location": {
                        "top_left": "POINT (-74.1 40.73)",
                        "bottom_right": "POINT (-71.12 40.01)"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
